meta.name: generic_plan_example_1
meta.notes: Industry-agnostic. No vertical facts. Uses grounding_preview as the only source of specifics.

inputs.business_info: Local service business. Customer wants a quick pre-design + estimate.

outputs.form_mapping_json: [{"key":"project_goal","goal":"What outcome do you want?","why":"Aligns the design to the buyer intent","component_hint":"choice","priority":"critical","importance_weight":0.2,"expected_metric_gain":0.18},{"key":"style_direction","goal":"What style should it feel like?","why":"Sets the aesthetic direction","component_hint":"choice","priority":"high","importance_weight":0.18,"expected_metric_gain":0.15},{"key":"budget_tier","goal":"What budget range are you aiming for?","why":"Prevents unrealistic options","component_hint":"budget_cards","priority":"high","importance_weight":0.16,"expected_metric_gain":0.12}]

meta.name: generic_plan_example_2
meta.notes: Industry-agnostic; focuses on upload requirement for use_case tryon.

inputs.business_info: E-commerce style try-on experience. Generate visuals then convert lead.
